# ESLint Config ChutiphonK
> Chutiphon-k ESLint Config file

## Usage
- Install packages
```sh
	yarn add -D eslint https://chutiphon-k@github.com/chutiphon-k/eslint-config-chutiphonk.git
```

- Add eslint-config-chutiphonk to .eslintrc
```json
	{
		"extends": "chutiphonk"
	}
```
